Catalog_Raisonne:
Masterpieces from the Japanese painting collection of the Minneapolis Institute of Art
ミネアポリス美術館 日本絵画の名品 Cat.51
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper with mica
signed: 東洲斎写楽画 {Tōshūsai Sharaku ga}
text:
Related to the play Koi nyōbō somewake tazuna 恋女房染分手綱, performed at the Kawarazaki Theater in the fifth lunar month of 1794.
20 impressions known.
title: Actor Ichikawa Ebizō as Takemura Sadanoshin
